name: Risky Drive
description:
Drive on the most colorful and twisted endless race tracks of all time. Avoid the obstacles and drift until the wheels of your car fall off! Charge your nitro booster and destroy everything on your way!

This is NOT your normal Sunday morning drive. This is the most wanted adrenaline rush for in-between.

Are you up for this new challenge?

Features:
Single-tap hyper casual gameplay
Real-time track and obstacle randomization
20 cars to unlock
Haptic feedback for all supporting devices
GameCenter to compete with your friends
